short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is an Enhancer for Youtube to improve your watching experience!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube™ Enhancer Plus is one of Youtube™ addons for Chrome. The YouTube plugin is lightweight and useful , helping you to enhance the viewing experience of YouTube videos and save your clicking time.
What we can do:
  - Auto play
  - Auto fullcreen
  - Auto HD
  - Repeat YouTube Video
  - Skip Youtube ad
  - Forced Volume
  - Translate captions
  - Customize YouTube Shortcuts
  - ...

We are not affiliated with YouTube or an official extension.
